name: Snake Immortal: The Tale of a Snakes Cultivation to Immortality
author: UpdatingStatusOnGoingTypeManhua
content: In a village, an old snake inadvertently swallowed a cultivator&#039s human-shaped pill, gaining intelligence and setting off on the path of cultivation. With only a brief decade to live, the snake does not fear the passing of time but makes the most of every moment.This is the tale of an old snake&#039s journey to immortality.
